src:
Pet stvari, s katerimi bo vsaka ženska še bolj uživala v seksu
Obstaja nekaj na videz malenkostnih dejanj, ki znatno izboljšajo seks.
01 Nov 2019, 19:36 by M. F.
So malenkosti, ki oplemenitijo intimno dejanje in bi jih morala v spolno življenje vključiti vsaka ženska. Kaj lahko storite za še boljši seks?
Zaupajte partnerju svoje želje in pričakovanja
Najbrž vam bo spočetka o njih težko govoriti na glas, a dejstvo je, da bo le, če bo poznal vaše želje in pričakovanja, te tudi izpolnil. Spolne fantazije, dotike, hitrost, ritem, fetiše, skratka vse, kar je povezano s spolnostjo, ubesedite brez zadrege.
Vodite ga po erogenih conah
Morda jim ne namenja dovolj pozornosti, morda vseh vročih točk na vašem telesu sploh ne pozna, zato ga seznanite z njimi in ga vodite po njih ter mu pokažite, stimulacija katerih vas pripelje do največjega užitka.
Primite ga za roko in jo popeljite tja, kjer bi jo radi čutili
Včasih zahrepenite po dotiku na nekem delu telesa. Tedaj ga primite za roko in jo popeljite tja, kjer bi jo radi čutili.
Jasno recite ne
Če vam v spalnici kaj ne ustreza, brez zadržkov spregovorite o tem, kaj v vas vzbuja nelagodje. Če boste molčali in se podrejali zgolj njegovim željam, zagotovo ne boste deležni dobrega seksa.
Spregovorite o svojih negotovostih
Te lahko ustvarjajo miselno prepreko, zaradi katere popolno spolno zadovoljstvo ni dosegljivo. Vas je strah, da ste dolgočasni, da ne obvladate katerega od položajev, ste negotovi zaradi izvedbe ali svojega telesa? Vse to mu pojasnite in povejte, kaj vas med rjuhami najbolj muči. Kajti odkrita komunikacija je tudi s tega vidika nepogrešljiva in le z njo lahko premagate tisto, kar vam stoji na poti do popolnega spolnega užitka.
text:
Five things that every woman will enjoy more about sex
There are some seemingly minor acts that significantly enhance sex.
01 Nov 2019, 19:36 by M.F.
They are the little things that enhance an intimate act and should be included in the sex life by every woman. What can you do to get better sex?
Tell your partner your wishes and expectations
You may find it difficult to speak out loud at first, but the fact is that only if he knows your wishes and expectations will he fulfill you. Sexual fantasies, touching, speed, rhythm, fetishes, in short everything related to sexuality, be embarrassing.
Take him through the erogenous zones
He may not be paying enough attention to them, he may not be aware of all the hot spots on your body, so get acquainted with them and guide him through them and show him the stimulation that brings you the most pleasure.
Grab it by the hand and take it where you want to feel it
Sometimes you crave touching on some part of your body. Then take it by the hand and take it where you want to feel it.
Clearly say no
If something is not right for you in the bedroom, speak without hesitation about what is causing you discomfort. If you keep quiet and submit to his wishes, you will certainly not have good sex.
Talk about your insecurities
These can create a mental barrier that makes complete sexual satisfaction unattainable. Are you afraid of being bored, not in control of any of the positions, uncertain about your performance or your body? Explain this to him and tell him what is most troublesome among your sheets. Since honest communication is also indispensable in this aspect, and only through it can you overcome what stands in your way to complete sexual pleasure.
